sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Col, Row, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Trash } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; import { orderData } from '../data/cartData'; import '../style/Cart.css' const Cart = () => { const [orderList, setOrderList] = useState(orderData); return (

Cart

Items:

{orderList.length}

Total Price:

{ orderList.reduce((prevVal, currValue) => ( prevVal + currValue.amount * (currValue.sku.price * (100 - currValue.sku.discount) / 100) ), 0) }

) } export default Cart;
